channel.title: --pro-pk development team needed--
channel.description:
I am currently looking for a lot of positions. This is a 24/7 server pk planet base, but has been modified a lot. any web developer needs to know html and php.
This server is based on (obviously) pking, but a steady economy. To do this i will need a team dedicated to helping. In the long end i know this server will be huge, and i plan on getting a dedicated server.
If there is any additional details you must need please do not hesitate to ask.
Thank you for reading this and taking your time to fill out the application!
I need an application in the format of:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Name: Age: What Applying For: How long have you been doing this: Why should we choose you over anyone else: Any proof( if needed) of what applying for: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ SPOTS OPEN ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WEB DEVELOPER WEB MODERATOR WEB MODERATOR
SERVER CODER SERVER CODER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
SPOTS TAKEN
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
*IF YOU ARE EXCEPTED YOU MUST HAVE A SKYPE. YOU DO NOT NEED A MIC.*

item.title: --pro-pk development team needed--
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Please read the sticky about how to make a development team. You need to explain what the team is for, the concept, milestones, goals, etc. Don’t just say “I’m making a team, this is what I need.” I’ll give you a bit to modify your post, but if it isn’t modified by the time I log off, I’m locking it.

Read full topic
